title: MapDialogue.detectivesOffice
body:
<<if $CanTravel is true>>
    <<thinkingFont Dialogue>>    
    <<if $morgueCall == true and visited ("MorticianCall.Call") is false>>
            [[MorticianCall.Call]]
    <<else>>
        Time to head out.
        <<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
        ->Head to the Murder Scene. <<if $murdersceneUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject lobby>>
        ->Head to the Alleyway. <<if $alleyUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject alleyway>>
        ->Head to the Bar.  <<if $barUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject BarLevel>>
        ->Head to the Morgue. <<if $morgueUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject Morgue>>
        ->Head to Logan Rutledge's Apartment. <<if $logansapartmentUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject LogansApartment>>
        ->Head to Nora Hastings' Apartment. <<if $norasapartmentUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject NoraApartment>>  
        ->Head to Rachel Baxter's Office. <<if $rachelsofficeUnlocked == true>>
            <<loadLevel MapObject RachaelOffice>>
        ->Head to the InterviewRoom. <<if $interviewroomUnlocked == true>>
            [[Interview.ChooseSuspect]]
        ->Stay Here.
            [[MapDialogue.Exit]]
    <<endif>>
<<else>>
    I should answer that.
<<endif>>

title: MapDialogue.lobby
body:
<<if $CanTravel is true>>
    <<thinkingFont Dialogue>>    
    <<if $MurderBoardTutorial is false and $inOffice is false>>
        I should head back to the office and go over what I've found.
            ->Leave now
                <<set $MurderBoardTutorial to true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject detectivesOffice>>
            ->Look around more
                
    <<else>>
        <<if $morgueCall == true and visited ("MorticianCall.Call") is false>>
            [[MorticianCall.Call]]
        <<else>>
            Time to head out.
            <<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
            ->Head to the Office.
                <<loadLevel MapObject detectivesOffice>>
            ->Head to the Alleyway. <<if $alleyUnlocked == true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject alleyway>>
            ->Head to the Bar.  <<if $barUnlocked == true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject BarLevel>>
            ->Head to the Morgue. <<if $morgueUnlocked == true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject Morgue>>
            ->Head to Logan Rutledge's Apartment. <<if $logansapartmentUnlocked == true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject LogansApartment>>
            ->Head to Nora Hastings' Apartment. <<if $norasapartmentUnlocked == true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject NoraApartment>>  
            ->Head to Rachel Baxter's Office. <<if $rachelsofficeUnlocked == true>>
                <<loadLevel MapObject RachaelOffice>>
            ->Head to the InterviewRoom. <<if $interviewroomUnlocked == true>>
                [[Interview.ChooseSuspect]]
            ->Stay Here.
                [[MapDialogue.Exit]]
        <<endif>>
    <<endif>>
<<else>>
    I still have something to find here
<<endif>>

title: Interview.ChooseSuspect
body:
Who should I bring in for questioning?
<<if $whiskeyglassConnectsTologan == true or $rifleConnectsTorachael == true or $syringeConnectsTonora == true>>
    <<if $whiskeyglassConnectsTologan == true>>
    ->Logan Rutledge
        <<set $suspect to "Logan">>
        <<loadLevel MapObject InterviewRoom>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $rifleConnectsTorachael is true>>
    ->Rachael Baxter
        <<set $suspect to "Rachael">>
        <<loadLevel MapObject InterviewRoom>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $syringeConnectsTonora == true>>
    ->Nora Hastings
        <<set $suspect to "Nora">>
        <<loadLevel MapObject InterviewRoom>>
    <<endif>>
<<else>>
->No one yet
<<endif>>

title: MapDialogue.Matrix
body:
<<if !visited("MapDialogue.Matrix")>>
    ??????: Hello Neo.
    Detective: What? Who is this?
    ??????: I... am Morpheus.
    Morpheus: You have a choice to make.
    Morpheus: The red pill or the blue pill?
    ->Red Pill
        Entering the Matrix
        <<enterTheMatrix FirstPersonCharacter>>
        [[MapDialogue.Matrix.End]]
    ->Blue Pill
        Leaving the Matrix
        <<leaveTheMatrix FirstPersonCharacter>>
        [[MapDialogue.Matrix.End]]
<<else>>
    Morpheus: Did you change your mind?
    ->Red Pill
        Entering the Matrix
        <<enterTheMatrix FirstPersonCharacter>>
    ->Blue Pill
        Leaving the Matrix
        <<leaveTheMatrix FirstPersonCharacter>>
<<endif>>
